ship walk through.description: Join us as we enjoy Christmas Eve festivities onboard the Carnival Miracle for a 7-day adventure! We embark on a 7-day Christmas cruise from Long Beach to Puerto Vallarta, Mazatlan and Cabo San Lucas.
